Overview[]: Tony is brutal and sadistic individual who went along with his group's heinous acts. He has no qualms with stealing and murdering other survivors. He is shown to be quite cruel, at one point holding down a thief's hand for Joe to chop off. He helps beat up Len who was deemed a traitor without hesitation. While holding Michonne at gunpoint, he implies he will most likely rape her after Carl . However, after Rick kills Joe, Tony becomes distracted allowing Michonne to shoot Tony with his own gun.
Pre-Apocalypse[]: Nothing is known about Tony's life prior to or as the outbreak began.
Post-Apocalypse[]: At some point following the outbreak, Tony joined a group of survivors led by Joe that would eventually become known as the Claimers and he gradually became Joe's right-hand man.
Death[]: Killed By Michonne Hawthorne While distracted after Rick kills Joe, Michonne grabs Tony's hand, forces it back towards his head and fires his revolver, killing him.
Killed Victims[]: This list shows the victims Tony has killed: Lou (Zombified, Possibly, Alongside fellow Claimers ) Len (Alongside his fellow Claimers) 2 unnamed men (1 Caused, 1 Alongside a fellow Claimer) 1 unnamed thief (Caused) Numerous counts of zombies and unnamed people
Trivia[]: Tony, aside from Joe, is the only Claimer seen in the TV Series to make a physical appearance in Red Machete . Tony shares a lot of similarities with a member of the Living of the same name. They both are named Tony, are secondary antagonists, are most likely rapists, and are killed via gunshot.
